Episodes.Title: Comedians
Episodes.Plot:
Beavis and Butt-head decide to become stand-up comedians, perform at a comedy club, get booed and burn the place down.¹
videos:   Primus - ""My Name is Mud""   Tiffany - ""I Think We're Alone Now""   Vince Neil - ""Sister of Pain""   Belly - ""Feed The Tree""
¹This episode was last shown edited as follows:
The scene where Butt-head gets the idea to become a comedian, Beavis says: ""Let's go over to Stewart's house and burn something.""  The edited version has Butt-head interrupting Beavis after

Episodes.Title: Carwash
Episodes.Plot:
Needing money to replace the batteries in their TV remote control, Beavis and Butt-head offer to wash a neighbor's vintage car. They take it for a drive to air dry it, and get into an accident with Mr. Anderson.
videos:   24-7 Spyz - ""Stuntman""   Bon Jovi - ""In These Arms""   Vanessa Williams - ""Work To Do""

Episodes.Title: Couch-Fishing
Episodes.Plot:
The boys reel in various things (and people) while casting from the couch, and then get Stewart in trouble with the law.
videos:   INXS - ""Not Enough Time""   Danzig - ""Mother""   Suicdal Tendencies - ""Institutionalised""   Bee Gees - ""Jive Talkin'""

Episodes.Title: Kidnapped
Episodes.Plot:
Beavis and Butt-head want to go to a concert so they try to kidnap Stewart for ransom money...but quickly get sick of him.
videos:   Kix - ""Cool Kids""   Kylie Minogue - ""Locomotion""   Raging Slab - ""Anywhere But Here""   White Zombie - ""Welcome to Planet Motherfucker""   Led Zeppelin - ""Over The Hills And Far Away""   The Shamen - ""Ebeneezer Goode""   Blondie - ""Rapture""   Beastie Boys - ""Gratitude""

Episodes.Title: Naked Colony

Episodes.Title: Cleaning House
Episodes.Plot:
Van Driessen has Beavis and Butt-head clean his house to learn about work and money; instead they learn that 8-track tapes aren't waterproof.
videos:   Krokus - ""School's Out""   Mission UK - ""Like A Child Again""   Army Of Lovers - ""Crucified""
